page.title: 15GAMES:ST.LEONARD'S, PRESTON
page.content: {TIN CAN CALINKI}is a bit like hide and and seek. Somebody is'on',and we say "go"and kick the can.The person who is counting, counts to one hundred and then finds the can.If the person who is on sees someone he shouts"Tin Can Calinki", and if you get your 'whip' (back to the base, freely) you shout your name and "Tin Can Calinki". {SKIPPING.}I brought ropes to school and played the skipping game,where two people turned the rope and sang this song. "When its your birthday please jump in,January,February,March,April, May,June,July,August,September, Octo_ ber,November,December. When it's your birthday please jump out.January,Febr_ uary,March,April,May,June,July,August, September,October,November, December. {ROLLERBOOTS}are like trainers, but are boots,with wheels on. I like playing on mine because it is exciting.
